questions.text: Who were the three team members that Bill selected to be on his team for the final task at the lavish golf tournament?
questions.explanation:
Katrina, Amy, and Nick.

	When it got down to Bill and Kwame, the final two, Mr. Trump brought back in the last six contestants to help these two with the final task.  Kwame chose Troy, Omarosa, and Heidi to be on his team.

questions.text: Which person fell asleep during the advertising campaign for the Marquee Jet card?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Jason was the project manager for this task.  He brought Sam into the boardroom with him, but because he failed to get to know the client he was fired by Mr. Trump.

questions.text: In the season finale, which contestant revealed that she and her husband were expecting a baby?
questions.explanation:
Tammy.

	Tammy tried to tell more about her pregnancy but she was cut off by Mr. Trump asking someone else a question.

questions.text: What type of product did Bill sell successfully in his own online business?
questions.explanation:
Cigars.

	Bill successfully started up his own internet site and sold cigars.  He will continue with this business on the side during his employment with Mr. Trump.

questions.text: Following the end of season one of "The Apprentice", Bill Rancic dated which of the following reality stars?
questions.explanation:
Jen--"The Bachelor".

	Jen Scheft and Bill Rancic are both from Chicago.  They met at a radio benefit in February of 2004.

questions.text: Which person was fired following the remodeling and leasing of the apartments?
questions.explanation:
Tammy.

	Tammy said that she felt she was duped.  This was a very big deal for her teammates who could not believe that she said this. They all felt that she was very bossy and demanding during this task.   Mr. Trump felt she was not worthy at this point so she was fired.

questions.text: Which female was the first to be fired?
questions.explanation:
Kristi.

	Kristi and Omarosa had it out following the flea market task.  Kristi had lost almost $200 of the money that they made selling the tank top shirts.  Kristi said that she wasn't very good with money, leading her to be fired.

questions.text: During the final task, Omarosa was very hard to get a hold of on the walkie talkie.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Every time someone would try to get a hold of her she was either trying on hats, dancing, or just talking about herself.  She was definitely the weakest link in Kwame's team.

questions.text: During the season finale, Ereka openly displayed her hard feelings towards Omarosa.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Ereka sat right next to Omarosa and said that she was a liar.  I think that she finally got in the last word.

questions.text: Which person was typically chosen first when teams were selected upon reshuffling?
questions.explanation:
Amy.

	Amy Henry was a good strategist.  Anytime that reshuffling was done, she was always the first person chosen because of her abilities that were shown in the previous tasks.  She also got along with well with almost everyone.
